args.natural_language_statement: Let X be a metric space. Prove that in a complete metric space X, if S ⊆ X is closed and totally bounded, then S is compact. Translate this to Lean 4/Mathlib4. End the Lean lemma with := by sorry.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Filter Function TopologicalSpace Topology Set UniformSpace Uniformity

/-- Let X be a metric space. Prove that in a complete metric space X, if S ⊆ X is closed and totally bounded, then S is compact. Translate this to Lean 4/Mathlib4. End the Lean lemma with := by sorry. -/
theorem complete_of_totallyBounded_isClosed {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X] [CompleteSpace X] {S : Set X}
    (S_tot : TotallyBounded S) (S_cl : IsClosed S) : IsCompact S

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- In a complete metric space, a closed totally bounded set is compact. -/
theorem totally_bounded_closed_is_compact {X : Type _} [MetricSpace X] [CompleteSpace X]
  {S : Set X} (hS : TotallyBounded S) (hSclosed : IsClosed S) : IsCompact S := by
  sorry
